name: Scrap Run
description:
Part of the Dog House Jam II

Take on the role of everyone's favorite mechanic in Scrap Run! Meet with customers and repair their vehicles, all while exploring your sprawling service center. Gather Scrap from around the map to unlock new areas and make your repairs before the time runs out!


Credits:
Tech Art: Ryan Arnold

Narrative: Bri Torres

2D Art: Josie Dickinson 

Level Design / Sound Implementer: Sebastian Unrat 

Animator: Mason Jones

Audio: Ellie Bruhns

Programming / Scripting: Dylan Malla

Scripting: Evan Eberhardt

Production: Lauren Paige
